TopicTitle: Waiting for official working mod update thread..

Articles.Content: Until then I suppose you could post here on what we find works currently. However, be forewarned that I won't be babysitting the thread. I will, however, transfer findings after an official page is opened.

9 minutes ago, Talavar said:

Until then I suppose you could post here on what we find works currently. However, be forewarned that I won't be babysitting the thread. I will, however, transfer findings after an official page is opened.

I dont think that in the entire history of KSP there has been an official (made by Squad)  mod compatibility thread.  Usually they are just like this one although  the person starting them has an intention to provide a service to the mod using forum goers or at least some interest in taking part

1 minute ago, SpannerMonkey(smce) said:

I dont think that in the entire history of KSP there has been an official (made by Squad)  mod compatibility thread.  Usually they are just like this one although  the person starting them has an intention to provide a service to the mod using forum goers or at least some interest in taking part

 Well, until that good soul comes along, There's this. I'd do it myself, but unfortunately, there is no way for me to constantly watch it, as my day-job is pretty time demanding
